{{also|Eins|-eins}} ==German== {{cardinalbox|de|0|1|2|Null|zwei|ord=erste}} ===Etymology=== From {{m|de|eines}}, originally the neuter form of {{m|de|ein}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|[aɪ̯ns]}} * {{audio|de|De-eins.ogg|audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|de|numeral}} # [[one]] {{gloss|numerical value represented by the Arabic numeral 1; first positive number in the set of natural numbers}} #: {{ux|de|die Nummer '''eins'''|the number '''one'''|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|'''eins''' plus zwei|'''one''' plus two|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|hundert und '''eins'''|one hundred and '''one'''|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|Absatz '''eins'''|paragraph '''one'''|inline=1}} # {{lb|de|colloquial}} one, one [[o'clock]] #: {{ux|de|Es ist '''eins'''.|It's '''one''' [o'clock].|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|um '''eins'''|at '''one'''|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|nach '''eins'''|after '''one'''|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|kurz vor '''eins'''|shortly before '''one'''|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|ab '''eins'''|from '''one''' [o'clock]|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|bis '''eins'''|until '''one'''|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|Es ist Punkt '''eins'''.|It's '''one o'clock''' sharp|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|halb '''eins'''|(''literally, half '''one''''') half past twelve|inline=1}} ====Usage notes==== ''Eins'' is not used before a noun; for the [[article]] that does precede a noun, see {{m|de|ein}}. ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|de|pronoun form}} # {{alternative form of|de|eines}}: {{inflection of|de|einer||str|nom//acc|n|s}} #: {{ux|de|Meine Schwester hat ein Fahrrad und ich will auch '''eins'''.|My sister has a bike and I want '''one''' too.}} ====Usage notes==== Only this form is commonly heard in colloquial German. In formal writing, ''eins'' is also perfectly acceptable but somewhat less frequent than ''eines''. ===Adverb=== {{head|de|adverb}} # {{lb|de|somewhat|informal}} {{n-g|only used in}} '''[[sich eins sein]]''' (“to [[agree]]”) ''and'' '''[[eins werden]]''' (“to arrive at an agreement”) #: ''Wir sind über den Preis nicht '''eins''' geworden.'' – We couldn't agree on the price. ====Synonyms==== {{m|de|einig}} (more common) [[Category:German cardinal numbers]] {{topics|de|One}} ---- ==Icelandic== ===Pronunciation=== * {{rhymes|is|eins}} ===Adverb=== {{head|is|adverb}} # [[alike]] ====Derived terms==== * {{l|is|alveg eins}} (exactly alike, [[identical]]) * {{l|is|undir eins}} ([[immediately]]) ===Conjunction=== {{head|is|conjunction}} # used in set phrases #: ''Hann er '''eins''' stór og þú.'' #:: He is '''as''' big as you. ====Derived terms==== * {{l|is|alveg eins og}} ([[exactly]] as) * {{l|is|eins og}} * {{l|is|eins...og}} (as...as) * {{l|is|falla eins og flís við rass}} {{is-numeral (einn)|}} ===Numeral=== {{head|is|numeral form}} # {{inflection of|is|einn||gen|m|s}} # {{inflection of|is|einn||gen|n|s}}
